remarks.format:
## Remarks This abstract class provides no operations; however, it is the base class from which all classes that represent SAML statements derive. For example, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AttributeStatement> class, which represents a SAML Attribute Statement, derives from this class. This class is also used to declare collections of SAML Statements in classes as in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion.Statements%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
For more information about the StatementAbstractType, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.
